DOC.brief_summary: It randomize clinical trial compare two treatment patient affected patellofemoral syndrome ( PFS ) . Our aim investigate effectiveness inclusion trigger point dry needling management idividuals patellofemoral pain syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Manual Therapy Dry Needling Patellofemoral Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Patients The sample involve patient diagnose nonspecific patellofemoral syndrome . The treatment carry School Physiotherapy ( University Valencia ) . The study comprise patient nonspecific patellofemoral syndrome . Patients exclude study osteoarthritis , recent injury , ligament injury , meniscal lesion , previous injury / treatment lasting period 6 month prior study . Study design It single-blind randomize control study . 3 session conduct 7-day interval 15 day last intervention follow-up 3 month treatment end . Each session last approximately 30 minute . The sample divide two group : - Control group manual therapy strengthen exercise quadriceps hamstring . - Experimental group receive manual therapy strengthen exercise quadriceps hamstring combine dry needling treatment ( DN ) myofascial trigger point ( MTrP ) vastus medialis vastus lateralis quadriceps muscle strengthen exercise quadriceps hamstring . Intervention Study treatment consist comprehensive joint treatment lumbar region lower limbs related biomechanics knee . In way , aim globally balance possible dysfunction may exist low lumbar region sacroiliac joint , hip , knee ankle . Assessment The initial assessment clinical interview characteristic patellofemoral syndrome month prior study , follow assessment instrument use : - Intensity knee pain treatment evaluate treatment monitoring . - KOOS ( Knee Injury Osteoarthritis Outcome Score ) . It assess five dimension : pain , symptom , activity daily live , sport recreational activity quality life relate knee . To evaluate osteoarthritis old patient , 24 WOMAC question include . - KSS ( Knee Society Score ) . It modify scale American Knee Society . It make possible separate purely functional aspect knee joint , knee score , related patient 's ability walk climb stair , functional score . It include three main parameter ( pain , stability range motion ) parameter ( contraction flexion , loss extension alignment ) consider deduction score former , possibly present interobserver variation . -IKDC ( International Knee Documentation - Committee ) . It instrument ass symptom , function , sport activity applicable variety condition knee . Validated variety knee condition include ligament , meniscal articular cartilage injury also osteoarthritis patellofemoral pain .
DOC.criteria: Aged 19 60 year . Patients diagnose nonspecific patellofemoral syndrome . Positive sign patellofemoral glide test ; Negetive McMurry test ; Full knee range motion ; Anterior knee pain , relate prolonged sitting , climb stair , descend stair ; No relevant patellofemoral degenerative change image ; No history knee trauma . Patients exclude study osteoarthritis , recent injury , ligament injury , meniscal lesion , previous injury / treatment lasting period 6 month prior study .
